lib/raxol/core/error_reporter.ex:307:contract_supertype
Type specification is a supertype of the success typing.

Function:
Raxol.Core.ErrorReporter.add_standard_data/4

Type specification:
@spec add_standard_data(any(), map(), any(), any()) :: any()

Success typing:
@spec add_standard_data(
  %{
    :context => _,
    :error_details => binary(),
    :error_type =>
      :compilation
      | :component_lifecycle
      | :optimization
      | :performance
      | :runtime
      | :terminal_io
      | :ui_rendering,
    :session_id => _,
    :timestamp => %DateTime{
      :calendar => atom(),
      :day => pos_integer(),
      :hour => non_neg_integer(),
      :microsecond => {_, _},
      :minute => non_neg_integer(),
      :month => pos_integer(),
      :second => non_neg_integer(),
      :std_offset => integer(),
      :time_zone => binary(),
      :utc_offset => integer(),
      :year => integer(),
      :zone_abbr => binary()
    }
  },
  map(),
  _,
  _
) :: %{
  :context => _,
  :error_details => binary(),
  :error_type =>
    :compilation
    | :component_lifecycle
    | :optimization
    | :performance
    | :runtime
    | :terminal_io
    | :ui_rendering,
  :session_id => _,
  :timestamp => %DateTime{
    :calendar => atom(),
    :day => pos_integer(),
    :hour => non_neg_integer(),
    :microsecond => {_, _},
    :minute => non_neg_integer(),
    :month => pos_integer(),
    :second => non_neg_integer(),
    :std_offset => integer(),
    :time_zone => binary(),
    :utc_offset => integer(),
    :year => integer(),
    :zone_abbr => binary()
  },
  :pattern_analysis => _,
  :performance_data => %{
    :current_performance => %{
      :memory_usage => <<_::40>>,
      :parser_time => <<_::72>>,
      :render_queue_size => 12
    },
    :performance_impact => <<_::512>>,
    :phase3_targets => %{
      :memory_limit => <<_::40>>,
      :parser_speed => <<_::72>>,
      :render_batching => <<_::56>>
    }
  },
  :suggested_fixes => %{
    :confidence => number(),
    :recovery_steps => [any()],
    :template_suggestions => binary() | [<<_::64, _::size(8)>>, ...]
  }
}

Function:
Raxol.Core.ErrorReporter.add_comprehensive_data/4

Type specification:
@spec add_comprehensive_data(any(), map(), any(), any()) :: any()

Success typing:
@spec add_comprehensive_data(
  %{
    :context => _,
    :error_details => binary(),
    :error_type =>
      :compilation
      | :component_lifecycle
      | :optimization
      | :performance
      | :runtime
      | :terminal_io
      | :ui_rendering,
    :session_id => _,
    :timestamp => %DateTime{
      :calendar => atom(),
      :day => pos_integer(),
      :hour => non_neg_integer(),
      :microsecond => {_, _},
      :minute => non_neg_integer(),
      :month => pos_integer(),
      :second => non_neg_integer(),
      :std_offset => integer(),
      :time_zone => binary(),
      :utc_offset => integer(),
      :year => integer(),
      :zone_abbr => binary()
    }
  },
  map(),
  _,
  _
) :: %{
  :context => _,
  :error_details => binary(),
  :error_type =>
    :compilation
    | :component_lifecycle
    | :optimization
    | :performance
    | :runtime
    | :terminal_io
    | :ui_rendering,
  :learning_insights => map(),
  :phase3_analysis => %{
    :optimization_impact => <<_::320>>,
    :performance_correlation => <<_::368>>,
    :phase3_compliance => %{:compliant => false, :violations => [any(), ...]}
  },
  :phase4_tools => %{
    :automated_fixes => [<<_::168, _::size(48)>>, ...],
    :recommended_tools => [<<_::88, _::size(16)>>, ...],
    :tool_availability => %{:available => [any(), ...], :missing => []}
  },
  :recovery_options => %{
    :immediate_actions => [<<_::144, _::size(24)>>, ...],
    :long_term_improvements => [<<_::64, _::size(8)>>, ...],
    :preventive_measures => [<<_::208, _::size(24)>>, ...]
  },
  :session_id => _,
  :system_state => %{
    :ets_tables => non_neg_integer(),
    :memory_usage => non_neg_integer(),
    :process_count => non_neg_integer()
  },
  :timestamp => %DateTime{
    :calendar => atom(),
    :day => pos_integer(),
    :hour => non_neg_integer(),
    :microsecond => {_, _},
    :minute => non_neg_integer(),
    :month => pos_integer(),
    :second => non_neg_integer(),
    :std_offset => integer(),
    :time_zone => binary(),
    :utc_offset => integer(),
    :year => integer(),
    :zone_abbr => binary()
  },
  :pattern_analysis => _,
  :performance_data => %{
    :current_performance => %{
      :memory_usage => <<_::40>>,
      :parser_time => <<_::72>>,
      :render_queue_size => 12
    },
    :performance_impact => <<_::512>>,
    :phase3_targets => %{
      :memory_limit => <<_::40>>,
      :parser_speed => <<_::72>>,
      :render_batching => <<_::56>>
    }
  },
  :suggested_fixes => %{
    :confidence => number(),
    :recovery_steps => [any()],
    :template_suggestions => binary() | [<<_::64, _::size(8)>>, ...]
  }
}

lib/raxol/core/error_reporter.ex:418:contract_supertype
Type specification is a supertype of the success typing.

Function:
Raxol.Core.ErrorReporter.format_report/2

Type specification:
@spec format_report(any(), any()) :: String.t()

Success typing:
@spec format_report(
  %{
    :session_id => _,
    :batch_size => non_neg_integer(),
    :context => _,
    :end_time => %DateTime{
      :calendar => atom(),
      :day => pos_integer(),
      :hour => non_neg_integer(),
      :microsecond => {_, _},
      :minute => non_neg_integer(),
      :month => pos_integer(),
      :second => non_neg_integer(),
      :std_offset => integer(),
      :time_zone => binary(),
      :utc_offset => integer(),
      :year => integer(),
      :zone_abbr => binary()
    },
    :error_details => binary(),
    :error_type =>
      :compilation
      | :component_lifecycle
      | :optimization
      | :performance
      | :runtime
      | :terminal_io
      | :ui_rendering,
    :errors => [any()],
    :learning_insights => map(),
    :pattern_analysis => _,
    :performance_data => %{
      :current_performance => map(),
      :performance_impact => <<_::512>>,
      :phase3_targets => map()
    },
    :phase3_analysis => %{
      :optimization_impact => <<_::320>>,
      :performance_correlation => <<_::368>>,
      :phase3_compliance => map()
    },
    :phase4_tools => %{
      :automated_fixes => [any(), ...],
      :recommended_tools => [any(), ...],
      :tool_availability => map()
    },
    :queued_errors => non_neg_integer(),
    :recovery_options => %{
      :immediate_actions => [any(), ...],
      :long_term_improvements => [any(), ...],
      :preventive_measures => [any(), ...]
    },
    :start_time => _,
    :suggested_fixes => %{
      :confidence => number(),
      :recovery_steps => [any()],
      :template_suggestions => binary() | [any(), ...]
    },
    :system_state => %{
      :ets_tables => non_neg_integer(),
      :memory_usage => non_neg_integer(),
      :process_count => non_neg_integer()
    },
    :timestamp => %DateTime{
      :calendar => atom(),
      :day => pos_integer(),
      :hour => non_neg_integer(),
      :microsecond => {_, _},
      :minute => non_neg_integer(),
      :month => pos_integer(),
      :second => non_neg_integer(),
      :std_offset => integer(),
      :time_zone => binary(),
      :utc_offset => integer(),
      :year => integer(),
      :zone_abbr => binary()
    },
    :total_errors => _
  },
  :html | :json | :markdown | :text
) :: binary()

@spec make_openai_request(any(), any()) :: any()

Success typing:
@spec make_openai_request(
  %{
    :analysis => _,
    :context => %{:environment => map(), :system_info => map(), :timestamp => integer()},
    :format => <<_::32>>,
    :metrics => _,
    :options => %{
      :depth => _,
      :focus => _,
      :historical_data => _,
      :optimization_level => _,
      :service => _,
      _ => _
    },
    :version => <<_::24>>
  },
  nil | binary()
) ::
  {:error, %HTTPoison.Error{:__exception__ => true, :id => nil, :reason => _}}
  | {:ok,
     %{
       :__struct__ =>
         HTTPoison.AsyncResponse | HTTPoison.MaybeRedirect | HTTPoison.Response,
       :body => _,
       :headers => [any()],
       :id => reference(),
       :redirect_url => _,
       :request => %HTTPoison.Request{
         :body => _,
         :headers => _,
         :method => :delete | :get | :head | :options | :patch | :post | :put,
         :options => _,
         :params => _,
         :url => binary()
       },
       :request_url => _,
       :status_code => integer()
     }}

Function:
Raxol.Core.Performance.AIIntegration.parse_openai_response/1

Success typing:
(%{
  :__struct__ => HTTPoison.AsyncResponse | HTTPoison.MaybeRedirect | HTTPoison.Response,
  :body => _,
  :headers => [any()],
  :id => reference(),
  :redirect_url => _,
  :request => %HTTPoison.Request{
    :body => _,
    :headers => _,
    :method => :delete | :get | :head | :options | :patch | :post | :put,
    :options => _,
    :params => _,
    :url => binary()
  },
  :request_url => _,
  :status_code => integer()
}) ::
  {:error,
   <<_::240>>
   | %{
       :__struct__ =>
         HTTPoison.AsyncResponse | HTTPoison.MaybeRedirect | HTTPoison.Response,
       :body => _,
       :headers => [any()],
       :id => reference(),
       :redirect_url => _,
       :request => %HTTPoison.Request{
         :body => _,
         :headers => _,
         :method => :delete | :get | :head | :options | :patch | :post | :put,
         :options => _,
         :params => _,
         :url => binary()
       },
       :request_url => _,
       :status_code => integer()
     }}
  | %{
      :ai_confidence => float(),
      :code_suggestions => [
        %{
          :after => <<_::360, _::size(112)>>,
          :before => <<_::152, _::size(208)>>,
          :file => <<_::128, _::size(16)>>,
          :line => 12 | 45,
          :suggestion => <<_::128, _::size(16)>>
        },
        ...
      ],
      :insights => [<<_::408, _::size(48)>>, ...],
      :optimization_impact => %{<<_::64, _::size(8)>> => <<_::64, _::size(8)>>},
      :recommendations => [
        %{
          :area => <<_::64, _::size(8)>>,
          :code_example => <<_::64, _::size(8)>>,
          :description => <<_::440, _::size(152)>>,
          :effort => <<_::24, _::size(24)>>,
          :impact => <<_::64, _::size(8)>>,
          :priority => <<_::32, _::size(16)>>
        },
        ...
      ],
      :risk_assessment => %{
        :areas => [map(), ...],
        :immediate_concerns => [<<_::224, _::size(72)>>, ...],
        :long_term_risks => [<<_::208, _::size(64)>>, ...],
        :overall_risk => <<_::48>>
      }
    }

But the spec is:
(String.t()) :: {:ok, any()} | {:error, any()}

Raxol.Core.Events.EventManager.dispatch(_event :: %{:data => map(), :target => _, :timestamp => integer(), :type => atom()}) ::
  :ok
def a() do
  :ok
end

will never return since the success typing is:
(atom() | {atom(), map()} | {atom(), _, _}) :: :ok

and the contract is

    :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),
    :selection => nil | map(),
    :width => non_neg_integer()
  },

  nil | map()

  :default_style => map(),
  :height => non_neg_integer(),
  :scroll_position => non_neg_integer(),
  :scroll_region => nil | {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
  :scrollback => [[map()]],
  :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),
  :selection => nil | map(),
  :width => non_neg_integer()
}

But the spec is:
(
  Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.t(),
  non_neg_integer(),
  non_neg_integer(),
  non_neg_integer(),
  Raxol.Terminal.ANSI.TextFormatting.text_style()
) :: Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.t()

________________________________________________________________________________
lib/raxol/terminal/commands/executor.ex:277:invalid_contract
The @spec for the function does not match the success typing of the function.

Function:
Raxol.Terminal.Commands.Executor.execute_dcs_command/4

Success typing:
(_, binary(), _, _) ::
  {:ok, _} | {:error, :decdld_not_implemented | :malformed_dcs | :unknown_dcs, _}

But the spec is:

  Raxol.Terminal.Emulator.t()

    :scroll_region => tuple(),

    :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),

    :width => non_neg_integer(),
    :window_manager => _,
    :window_registry => _,
    :window_state => map(),
    :window_title => nil | binary()
  },
  _new_buffer :: bitstring()
)

    :double_width => false,
    :encircled => false,
    :faint => false,

    :overlined => false,
    :reverse => false,
    :strikethrough => false,
    :underline => false
  },

    :icon_name => <<>>,

    :maximized => false,

    :cache_misses => 0,
    :images_rendered => 0,
    :pipeline_optimizations => 0,
    :sixels_processed => 0
  },
  :pipeline => [(_ -> any()), ...],
  :sixel_cache => %{}
}

          :height => non_neg_integer(),
          :icon_name => nil | binary(),
          :last_col_exceeded => boolean(),
          :last_key_event => _,
          :main_screen_buffer => map(),
          :max_command_history => non_neg_integer(),
          :memory_limit => non_neg_integer(),
          :mode_manager => _,
          :output_buffer => binary(),
          :parser_state => _,
          :plugin_manager => _,
          :saved_cursor => nil | map(),
          :scroll_region => nil | {_, _},
          :scrollback_buffer => [any()],
          :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),
          :session_id => binary(),
          :state => atom(),
          :state_stack => [any()],
          :style => map(),
          :tab_stops => [any()],
          :width => non_neg_integer(),
          :window_manager => _,
          :window_title => nil | binary()
        },
        :font => binary(),
        :height => integer(),
        :icon_name => binary(),
        :id => nil | binary(),
        :parent => nil | binary(),
        :position => {integer(), integer()},
        :previous_size => nil | {integer(), integer()},
        :size => {integer(), integer()},
        :state => :active | :inactive | :maximized | :minimized,
        :title => binary(),
        :width => integer()
      },
  :window_manager => Raxol.Terminal.Window.Manager | nil
}

But the spec is:
(map()) :: t()

lib/raxol/terminal/integration/main.ex:114:53:call
The function call will not succeed.

Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Manager.clear(_buffer_manager :: pid())

will never return since the success typing is:
(%Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Manager{
  :active_buffer_type => :alternate | :main,
  :alternate_buffer => %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Core{
    :alternate_screen => boolean(),
    :cells => [[any()]],
    :cursor_blink => boolean(),
    :cursor_position => {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :cursor_style => atom(),
    :cursor_visible => boolean(),
    :damage_regions => [tuple()],
    :default_style => map(),
    :height => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_position => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_region => nil | {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :scrollback => [[any()]],
    :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),
    :selection => nil | map(),
    :width => non_neg_integer()
  },
  :main_buffer => %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Core{
    :alternate_screen => boolean(),
    :cells => [[any()]],
    :cursor_blink => boolean(),
    :cursor_position => {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :cursor_style => atom(),
    :cursor_visible => boolean(),
    :damage_regions => [tuple()],
    :default_style => map(),
    :height => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_position => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_region => nil | {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :scrollback => [[any()]],
    :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),
    :selection => nil | map(),
    :width => non_neg_integer()
  },
  :memory_limit => non_neg_integer(),
  :memory_usage => non_neg_integer(),
  :metrics => map()
}) :: %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Manager{
  :active_buffer_type => :alternate | :main,
  :alternate_buffer => %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Core{
    :alternate_screen => boolean(),
    :cells => [[any()]],
    :cursor_blink => boolean(),
    :cursor_position => {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :cursor_style => atom(),
    :cursor_visible => boolean(),
    :damage_regions => [tuple()],
    :default_style => map(),
    :height => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_position => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_region => nil | {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :scrollback => [[any()]],
    :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),
    :selection => nil | map(),
    :width => non_neg_integer()
  },
  :main_buffer => %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Core{
    :alternate_screen => boolean(),
    :cells => [[any()]],
    :cursor_blink => boolean(),
    :cursor_position => {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :cursor_style => atom(),
    :cursor_visible => boolean(),
    :damage_regions => [tuple()],
    :default_style => map(),
    :height => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_position => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_region => nil | {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :scrollback => [[any()]],
    :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),
    :selection => nil | map(),
    :width => non_neg_integer()

  :metrics => map()

Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.clear_line(
  _buffer :: %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer{
    :alternate_screen => boolean(),
    :cells => [
      [
        %Raxol.Terminal.Cell{
          :char => nil | binary(),
          :dirty => boolean(),
          :sixel => boolean(),

                :background =>
                  :black

                  | :magenta

from the success typing arguments:

    :style => map(),
    :tab_stops => [integer()],
    :width => non_neg_integer(),
    :window_manager => _,
    :window_title => nil | binary()
  },
  _new_buffer :: %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Core{
    :alternate_screen => boolean(),
    :cells => [[map()]],
    :cursor_blink => boolean(),
    :cursor_position => {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :cursor_style => atom(),
    :cursor_visible => boolean(),
    :damage_regions => [tuple()],
    :default_style => map(),
    :height => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_position => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_region => nil | {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :scrollback => [[map()]],
    :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),
    :selection => nil | map(),
    :width => non_neg_integer()
  }
)

breaks the contract
(Raxol.Terminal.Emulator.Struct.t(), Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.t()) ::
  Raxol.Terminal.Emulator.Struct.t()

Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.set_cursor_position(
  _buffer :: %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer{
    :alternate_screen => boolean(),
    :cells => [
      [
        %Raxol.Terminal.Cell{
          :char => nil | binary(),
          :dirty => boolean(),
          :sixel => boolean(),
          :style =>
            nil
            | %{

                  :black
                  | :blue
                  | :cyan
                  | :green
                  | :magenta
                  | nil
                  | :red
                  | :white

from the success typing arguments:

    :state_stack => [any()],
    :style => map(),
    :tab_stops => [integer()],
    :width => non_neg_integer(),
    :window_manager => _,
    :window_title => nil | binary()
  },
  _new_buffer :: %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Core{
    :alternate_screen => boolean(),
    :cells => [[map()]],
    :cursor_blink => boolean(),
    :cursor_position => {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :cursor_style => atom(),
    :cursor_visible => boolean(),
    :damage_regions => [tuple()],
    :default_style => map(),
    :height => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_position => non_neg_integer(),
    :scroll_region => nil | {non_neg_integer(), non_neg_integer()},
    :scrollback => [[map()]],
    :scrollback_limit => non_neg_integer(),
    :selection => nil | map(),
    :width => non_neg_integer()
  }
)

breaks the contract
(Raxol.Terminal.Emulator.Struct.t(), Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.t()) ::
  Raxol.Terminal.Emulator.Struct.t()

          :strikethrough => boolean(),
          :underline => boolean()

    :selection => nil | {integer(), integer(), integer(), integer()},
    :width => non_neg_integer()
  },
  _x :: any(),
  _y :: any()
)

will never return since the 1st arguments differ
from the success typing arguments:

(
  %Raxol.Terminal.ScreenBuffer.Core{
    :alternate_screen => boolean(),
    :cells => [[map()]],
    :cursor_blink => boolean(),

breaks the contract

        :scroll_region => nil,

      :buffer => nil,

        :g0 => :us_ascii,

      },

      :current_hyperlink => nil,
      :current_hyperlink_url => nil,

        :blink => true,

      :parser_state => %{:state => :ground},
      :plugin_manager => _,

      :scroll_region => nil,
      :scrollback_buffer => [],
      :scrollback_limit => _,

      :state => _,
      :state_stack => nil,
      :style => %{},
      :tab_stops => [],
      :width => integer(),

      :window_title => nil
    },
    :font => <<_::72>>,
    :height => integer(),
    :icon_name => <<_::64>>,
    :id => nil,
    :parent => nil,
    :position => {0, 0},
    :previous_size => nil,
    :size => {integer(), integer()},
    :state => :inactive,
    :title => <<_::64>>,
    :width => integer()
  }
)

breaks the contract
(Raxol.Terminal.Window.t()) :: {:ok, window_id()} | {:error, term()}

        _ => _
      },
      :type => :key,
      _ => _
    }}}


but this value is unmatched.
